sentences.sentence: As I learned working among the Tuvans, nomadic yak herders of South Siberia, words can also be anchored to a specific place.
sentences.translation: 我在西伯利亚南部的游牧民族——以放牧牦牛为生的图瓦人中间做研究时发现，单词也可以固定用在特定的地点。

sentences.sentence: Yak conveyance from Lhas to Yaan was only once a year.
sentences.translation: 从拉萨到雅安的牦牛运输，一年只能往返一次。
